cast.overview: Bourne is brought out of hiding once again by reporter Simon Ross who is trying to unveil Operation Blackbriar, an upgrade to Project Treadstone, in a series of newspaper columns. Information from the reporter stirs a new set of memories, and Bourne must finally uncover his dark past while dodging The Company's best efforts to eradicate him.
cast.title: The Bourne Ultimatum

cast.overview: Loosely based on the criminal career of Frank Lucas, a gangster from La Grange, North Carolina, who smuggled heroin into the United States on American service planes returning from the Vietnam War, before being detained by a task force led by Newark Detective Richie Roberts.
cast.title: American Gangster

details.biography: Albert Jones (born November 4, 1981) is an actor who hails from North Carolina, where he cultivated his passion for storytelling from a young age. He trained at prestigious acting schools before embarking on a successful career in theater, film, and television.
details.name: Albert Jones
